content.content: @timbeiko is gathering feedback from the community to understand needs, impacts, and constraints relating to EIP-1559. In the spirit of this I created this thread for public posting from exchange stakeholders, but definitely reach out to him directly as well.   twitter.com    Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth (TimBeiko)  Then, exchanges 💰 (list was volume-based)  @bitfinex, @ComBkex, @OKEx, @Chiliz, @coinbase, @UniswapProtocol, https://t.co/DryfLHaFLt, @WhiteBit6, @LBank_Exchange, @kucoincom, @krakenfx, @BigONEexchange, @c0insbit, @Bitstamp Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth @TimBeikoGiven that at the end of the day, most usage of Ethereum is either done by major projects (Uniswap, tether, etc.) or via certain tooling (exchanges, wallets, etc.), those are the folks for which we need to gauge "implementation likeliness".    10:53 AM - 7 Sep 2020
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post, Tim Beiko, is asking for feedback from the community regarding EIP-1559. The post also includes a list of exchanges that Tim has reached out to for feedback. The post is an invitation for exchange stakeholders to provide their feedback and opinions on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
